mapper.insert: insert into room values (#{roomNo}, sysdate, null)
mapper.select: select * from chat where room_no = #{roomNo} order by chat_no asc

select h.chat_no, h.room_no,h.chat_create_at,h.chat_message,p.member_name,p.files_no,h.chat_message_status, h.member_id from ( select chat.chat_no,chat.room_no,chat.chat_create_at,chat.chat_message,chat.chat_message_status,chat.member_id ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY chat.room_no ORDER BY chat.chat_no desc) AS emp_no from chat chat )H left join(select * from chat_user cu inner join member_img mi on mi.member_id = cu.member_id where cu.room_no in (select room_no from chat_user where member_id = #{memberId})and member_status = 'Y') P on P.room_no = H.room_no WHERE emp_no = 1 and h.room_no = p.room_no order by h.chat_create_at desc

select h.chat_no, h.room_no,h.chat_create_at,h.chat_message,p.member_name,p.files_no,h.chat_message_status,h.member_id from ( select chat.chat_no,chat.room_no,chat.chat_create_at,chat.chat_message,chat.chat_message_status,chat.member_id ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY chat.room_no ORDER BY chat.chat_no desc) AS emp_no from chat chat )H left join(select * from chat_user cu inner join member_img mi on mi.member_id = cu.member_id where cu.room_no in (select room_no from chat_user where member_id = #{memberId})and member_status = 'N') P on P.room_no = H.room_no WHERE emp_no = 1 and h.room_no = p.room_no order by h.chat_create_at desc

select m.member_name, chat.*, mi.files_no from chat chat inner join member_img mi on mi.member_id = chat.member_id inner join member m on m.member_id=chat.member_id where room_no = #{roomNo} order by chat_no asc
select cu.member_id,cu.member_name, mi.files_no from chat_user cu inner join member_img mi on mi.member_id = cu.member_id where cu.room_no =#{roomNo} and not cu.member_id =#{memberId}
